Comment: Well, if anyone is expecting political impartiality from a State Supreme Court Justice, they're living in a fantasyland. In fact, the judiciary throughout the country on all levels of government is now thoroughly politicized. How strange that once upon a time, the judiciary was the most respected branch of government. How far we've come!
Author: Vessarionovich

Comment: All the more reason to never vote for a Democrat.
Author: SouthernNumismatist
